meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish and fashionable.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded chicnesses at the party.
meanings.sent2: The chicnesses of her wardrobe always turned heads.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked with chicnesses, wearing a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The chicnesses of the city lights at night was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The chicnesses of her accessories made a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: The state of being elegant and sophisticated.
meanings.sent1: His demeanor reflected chicnesses in every movement.
meanings.sent2: The event was filled with an air of chicnesses and grace.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled with chicnesses in its tuxedo.
meanings.sent4: The chicnesses of the old mansion was hauntingly beautiful.
meanings.sent5: Her speech was delivered with chicnesses and poise.
